name: Plaid Financial Insights Agent
description: AI-powered financial data analysis agent that provides transaction categorization, spending insights, income verification, and financial health scoring using Plaid's connected account data

skills.name: Transaction Categorization
skills.description: Automatically categorize transactions into detailed hierarchical categories using merchant data and transaction patterns

skills.name: Income Verification
skills.description: Analyze bank transactions to verify income sources, amounts, and stability for lending and employment verification
examples: Identify all income sources in account

skills.name: Spending Pattern Analysis
skills.description: Analyze spending habits and trends to provide personalized budgeting insights and recommendations

skills.name: Cash Flow Prediction
skills.description: Predict future cash flows based on recurring transactions, income patterns, and upcoming bills

skills.name: Financial Health Scoring
skills.description: Calculate comprehensive financial health score based on savings rate, debt-to-income, emergency fund, and spending habits

skills.name: Subscription Detection
skills.description: Detect and track recurring subscriptions, identify price changes, and flag unused subscriptions
